# `@particle/fetch-file` Changelog


## v2.0.1

### Fixes & Updates
* Update `node-fetch` dependency


## v2.0.0

### Fixes & Updates
* BREAKING - drop support for `node@8`
* BREAKING - simplified `progress` object passed to optional `onProgress` callback

* Minor `README.md` tuning
